content: > this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 the downloadable pdf listed for sale contains the full pattern including photo tutorials in one printable file without advertisements **3 theme options included** - tri-colored granny caddy - thin blue line - pineapple caddy learn to crochet a simple drink & phone caddy that s perfect for chairs that don t come with them already built-in this quick and easy crochet chair caddy is perfect for a variety of chairs it s great for beach chairs camp chairs patio chairs and it s even great for wheelchairs and walkers instructions are included to help you customize the size to fit your chair **the yarn** this crochet caddy is a great stash buster project so you can use almost any worsted weight / #4 yarn you have on hand i recommend using 100% cotton yarn for crochet drink holders because it is most absorbent it s durable and it s easy to care for simply toss it in the washer i made three samples and i chose to use worsted weight cotton for all 3 i love the color choices available in the lily sugar n cream line and it s easy to mix and match with peaches and cream and bernat handicrafter all 3 are very similar
